attributes.action: create June 6th as a National Holiday to honour the bravery of those members of the armed forces who liberated Europe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: June 6th 1944 was a day when our armed forces began the Liberation of Europe, many making the ultimate sacrifice in order that we all may be free from tyranny in this day and age. I urge the government to create this National Day to remember those who gave us our freedom.
